Name: Alcova Baptist Church Food Bank
Description: Hours: 1 to 4 p.m. Thursdays.
Address:
21295 Kortes Road (aka County Road 407)
Alcova, WY 82620

Name: Wyoming Food Bank of The Rockies
College Heights Baptist Church - Oasis Food Pantry
Description: Hours: Thursday10:00am - 4:00pmContact Sheri and Ray Hoevet to volunteer. For more information, please call.

Name: Casper Faith Food Pantry Helping Hands Community Services
Description: Hours:Tuesdays 12pm - 6pmLocated at the south (back) entrance.

Name: First Church of the Nazarene
Description: Hours: 1 to 3 p.m. Thursdays.

Name: Holy Cross Center
Description: Hours: 10 a.m. to noon and 1 to 3 p.m. weekdays (closed holidays).

Name: Joshua's Storehouse
Description:
Hours: 1 to 3:30 p.m. Mondays, 9:30 a.m to noon and 1 to 3:30 p.m. Tuesdays and Thursdays, 10 a.m. to noon and 1 to 3 p.m. Fridays.

Required: Two forms of identification for adults, such as a driver's license, green card or social security card; one form of identification for children, such as a Social Security card.

Name: Mountain View Southern Baptist Church
Description:
Hours: 1 to 4 p.m. Wednesdays.
 (in the basement)

Name: Our Savior's Lutheran Church
Description: Hours: 12:30 to 1:30 p.m. on the third Sunday of each month or by appointment.

Name: Restoration Church
Description:
The Restoration Church Food Pantry is set up to serve the needs of those in our community who may need a little extra help putting food on the table. Hours:Fridays 4:00pm to 6:00 pm 
Required: Photo identification. Use the Gannett Street entrance.

Name: The Salvation Army
Description:
Hours: 9 a.m. to noon and 1 to 2 p.m. weekdays.

Required: Fill out paperwork. No one is denied. Food boxes are limited to once a month.

Name: St. Mark's Church
Description:
Hours: Roughly 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. Mondays through Thursdays and 9 a.m. to noon Fridays. (Call ahead to confirm.) Closed during lunch.

Note: Nonperishable goods only.
(use the Seventh Street entrance), Casper.

Name: Central Wyoming Rescue Mission
Description: Hours: On weekdays, continental breakfast is served at 6 a.m., lunch is served at noon and dinner is served at 6 p.m. On weekends and holidays, brunch is served at 11 a.m. and dinner is served at 5 p.m.

Name: First United Methodist Church Mission Dinners
Description:
Meals take place at Kings Corner, 
Hours: Meals are served at 6 p.m. Tuesdays and 5 p.m. Sundays.

Name: Loaves and Fishes
Description:
Hours: Hot lunch is served 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. weekdays. HOURS: Monday- Friday, 11:00am- 1:00pm

SERVICES: Hot lunch served from 11:00am to 1:00pm Monday through Friday or each week.

ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS: 125% of poverty level and fill out financial status forms.

FEES: None

GEOGRAPHICAL AREA SERVED: Casper community, located in North Casper.

Name: The Salvation Army Hope Center
Description: Hours: 9 to 11 a.m. weekdays.

Name: St. Joseph Catholic Church
Description: St. Joseph is the smallest Catholic parish in Cheyenne and perhaps the most welcoming. Our parish motto is Catholics Devoted to Helping Those in Need. One way that we do that is through our food pantry. If you are in need of food we are here to help you.

Name: Needs, Inc.
Description: Office Hours: Monday-Thursday 9:00am - 3:15pm Friday9:00am-2:15pmThe essential services we provide to our clients include:    Emergency food provision    Clothing assistance    Referrals to other health and human service agencies    School supplies    Holiday

Name: Comea Shelter
Description: It is the mission of COMEA to provide safe, secure, and temporary shelter to homeless men, women and children. The shelter collaborates with community programs and resources to create opportunities for independent living.

Name: Sunnyside Southern Baptist Church
Description: For more information, please call

Name: The King's Portion
Description: We collect and distribute food such as meat, canned goods, breads and other food items to those in need within the community. All items are given away at no cost. We also place orders with the Wyoming Food Bank of the Rockies.

Name: Open Door Church - Bread of Life Pantry
Description:
Free food and clothing are available.Hours:3rd Saturday 10:00 am to 11:30 am Providing up to 4,000 lbs. of fresh and dry goods. To all in need - no government requirements. Small food bags are available on Thursdays from 10:30am - 11:00am only for emergency needs.  

All food and clothing is provided by local Christians to help families,

Name: Green River Food Pantry
Description: Provides a food pantry.  Serving residents of Green River, Granger, Little America, and McKinnon Pantry hours: 1st and 3rd Thursdays: 10:00 am - 4:45 pm
Address:
550 Uinta Drive, Suite F
Green River, WY 82935

Name: Good Smaritan Mission
Description:
The Good Samaritan Mission has been quietly serving the physical, emotional and Spiritual needs of the hungry, hurting, homeless people in Teton County for over 40 years.  The mission is a true part of the Jackson Hole Community.

Call for more information on pantry hours.

Name: Laramie Soup Kitchen
Description:
Kitchen phone number: 307-460-1609Laramie  ‹ Soup Kitchen - More Than A Meal. Located in the lower-level of 
St Matthew's Episcopal Cathedral. Hours:Monday through Friday from 8:00am
 to 2:00pm. We serve lunch from 10:30am to 1:30pm and on Fridays provide
 sack lunches for the weekend. All are welcome. Donation are accepted.

Name: Salvation Army Food Panrty
Description: Hours from 10:00 a.m. to noon, and 1:00 to 5:00 p.m. Tuesday thru Friday

Name: Interfaith-Good Samaritan
Description:
USDA Food Commodities I-GS Office
Fourth Thursday each month 2 to 5 p.m. at the corner of 8th & Custer
Community Food Pantry Monday thru Friday 9 a.m. to 6 p.m.,
Tuesday &Wednesday until 8 p.m., and Saturday from noon to 4 p.m.

Name: Pinedale Food Basket
Description: Located across from Ridleys Grocery; open afternoons five days a week; emergency food available with call; thrift store associated with food program.

Name: Riverton Community Food Bank
Description:
Non-Profit public Charity.. We provide food for the Hungry Humans.  Please Call for Appointed Times before showing up.
WE ARE NOW  BY APPOINTMENT ONLY FOR NEW HOURS. 
We do deliver food to those who can not come to us.
Please Have a Valid ID for each adult , Birth certificates for each child, and proof of income and address. 
(this is due to those

Name: Rock Springs Food Bank
Description: Provides a food pantry.  Pantry hours: 2nd and 4th Thursdays: 10:00 am - 2:45 pm; 4:00 pm - 5:45 pm
